title: TL vs TSM
body:
was probably my favorite match up all day.
the defense TSM pulled off was just AMAZING !

max props to Turtle. would of been a BEAST Jinx if he ran {{item:3085}}  as the 6th instead of {{item:3172}}  and relied on Lustboy's Janna for MS bonuses. even better if Lustboy had swapped homeguards into captains for that option. AoE rockets would of been a BLAST to watch.

and definitely great job on Dyrus for defending waves and waves of super minions on top. the pressure on landing that perfect rumble ult into Cass/J4 locks just couldnt happen as they had planned. but great job TSM. definitely a great game.

and congrats to Team Liquid !
what a day to defeat the top NA team. great job stalling and taking it slow.
i can tell TL was working cautiously towards the last 15mins of the game. that PENTA on Turtle definitely left its mark.

whew. what a game.

replies.body:
First 30 minutes. TSM gets stomped. Dyrus played horribly and Turtle/Lust were pushed around.
Last 15-25 minutes. TSM got their shit together and Liquid played like SoloQ.

The game was entertaining to say the least, technical/skillwise it could have been way better.
